Articles.Content:
Squad, big props on all the effort into loading up the game... I played stock for a week (waiting for mod updates) and it was wicked fast... Now I've got a dozen plus mods and it's still stupid fast... I use to go out for a smoke and come back, now I can't make it back with a glass of water...

Cheers!

JS
It's a major improvement. I'm still surprised by how fast it loads.
